data.comment: Yan Dhanda (Swansea) has received a yellow card from Steve Martin.
In the minute 44, Goal! A Andre Ayew header gives Swansea a 0-1 lead in London.
In the minute 54, Goal! Jamal Lowe extends Swansea's lead to 0-2.
Steve Cooper (Swansea) is making a first substitution, with Korey Smith replacing Yan Dhanda.
Bright Osayi-Samuel is replacing Niko Hamalainen for QPR at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
In the minute 66, The home team have replaced Macauley Bonne with Charlie Kelman. This is the second substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
QPR make their third substitution with Chris Willock replacing Tom Carroll.
Albert Adomah is on a sub for Todd Kane for QPR.
In the minute 79, Dominic Ball (QPR) gets a yellow card.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
